transpose.DESCRIPTION: Discard cards from your Draw Pile, then move different cards from the Discard Pile to the bottom of your #yDraw #yPile.

plot.DESCRIPTION: These effects occur on drawing and manually discarding these cards (even from one's Draw Pile).

immortal.DESCRIPTION: Immortal cards #yupgrade other Immortal cards and can be #yupgraded any number of times.

wilting.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play a card, take #b1 (blockable) damage.

duality.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play an equal, non-zero number of Attacks and Skills in one turn, gain temporary #yStrength and #yDexterity next turn.

yin.DESCRIPTION: Yin fuels many cards. The higher value between #yYin and #yYang decreases by 1 each turn.

yang.DESCRIPTION: Yang fuels many cards. The high value between #yYin and #yYang decreases by 1 each turn.

affinity.DESCRIPTION: If you have more #yYin than #yYang, then when you gain #yYin, damage all enemies twice. If reversed, then when you gain #yYang, gain #yBlock.

daybreak.DESCRIPTION: Daybreaks are 0-cost #yEthereal attacks that give #yYang and #yExhaust.

nightfall.DESCRIPTION: Nightfalls are 0-cost #yEthereal skills that give #yYin and #yExhaust.
